title: Stocks Today
text:
The Nasdaq Composite may have just closed above 10,000 for the first time, but traders say one of its top performers can keep rallying.

It hit the milestone on Wednesday, but was down to 9,957 in Thursdayâ€™s premarket. Since Dec. 26, when the index first closed above 9,000, the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 has been a huge contributor to its move higher.
